name: Stamp
description:
RECOMMENDED PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE

Stamp is a game about stamping papers, sounds simple right?... WRONG. You've arrived on a particularly busy day, and the papers are coming through faster and faster and seem to be endless, but be careful not to use the wrong stamp, or you'll be FIRED!! Try to stamp as many papers as you can in this fast paced score-attack game, and beat your previous score.

Please feel free to leave a helpful comment and/or donation, and many thanks for playing.
